text:
RELIGION

Sri Srinivasa Perumal Temple, BHEL Township : Brahmotsavam, pallakku, Nachiar thirukolam, 6 a.m.; Garuda sevai, 7 p.m.

Srimad Ubhaya Vedantacharya Peetam : Discourse on Bhagavata Dasamaskandam by R.Anantharaman, 293, Sathara Street, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha : Sahasranama parayanam, Sri Kattazhagiasingar Sannidhi, Thiruvanaikovil, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam : Sri Rama Nama parayanam, 21, Teachers Colony, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Naalathe Trust : Natyanjali, G.Jayapriya, Assistant Commissioner, Vekkaliamman Temple, chief guest, Jambukeswarar Akilandeswari Temple, 5.30 p.m.; dance programmes by students Bala Kala Vidhanam, 6 p.m.; by Sri Senthilkumar and troupe of Natyakshetra, 7.10 p.m.; Mohanapriaya Thavaraja and troupe, Apsara Arts, 8 p.m.

GENERAL

National Institute of Technology Department of Civil Engineering: Moments – symposium, 9 a.m.

The Booksellers and Publishers Association of South India : Book fair, Corporation grounds, Anna Nagar, Thennur, 11 am. to 9 p.m.

Indian Medical Association : Update on PPLSSS and FSS schemes of IMA Tamil Nadu, S.Damodaran, State president, IMA, chief guest, IMAL Hall, Salai Road, 4.30 p.m.

Trichy Trekkers : International Women’s Day, bicycle expedition,near Corporation Office, 6.15 a.m.

St.Joseph’s College Shepherd Extension Department : International Women’s Day, T.Bhuvaneswari, Project Officer, Integrated Child Development Scheme, St.Joseph’s Higher Secondary School, Nagamangalam, 9 a.m

Tiruchi District Pensioners Association : Meeting, Bishop Heber Higher Secondary School, Teppakulam, 3.30 p.m.

Akila India Sivaji Mandram : Sivaji fans meet, screening of ‘Thyagam,’ Sruthi Hall, Sankaran Pillai Road, 5.30 p.m.

SEVAI Shanthi Matric Higher Secondary School, Arumbugal Nagar : First Aid training, 3 p.m.
title: tiruchi today
